question: In which nation "Escambray Mountains" are located?
explanation: Escambray Mountains are located in Cuba. Pico San Juan is its highest peak. This range houses Agabama River which divides the range into two. This range houses Topes de Collantes Nature Reserve Peak and Valley de Los Ingenios, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. It was also the location of the Escambray Rebellion of 1959 to 1965.
